name: FundOurKingdom
description:
You play as a King trying to get money for your kingdom and you need to clear all the chests in each level. Also along your journey collect as many coins as you can although it is not as much as the chests but will still help. As of right now it is the best option for us so please save the kingdom. But be wary of the enemy pink kingdom trying to stop you. And watch out for traps and monsters that may be your doom.

CONTROLS: Use "A" and "D" To move left and right respectively. Jump and double jump is the space bar. Use "F" to shoot a spell. Use "Shift" to run
